ICausticFactory

Defines the main factory for creating Caustic objects

Functions
CreateSampler
virtual void CreateSampler(
IGraphics *pGraphics,
ITexture *pTexture,
ISampler **ppSampler
) = 0

Creates a new sampler. Samplers defined how shaders read from textures.

Parameters
pGraphics
IGraphics*

graphics device

pTexture
ITexture*

texture to associate with sampler

ppSampler
ISampler**

Returns the newly create sampler

CreateCamera
virtual void CreateCamera(
bool leftHanded,
ICamera **ppCamera
) = 0

Creates a new camera object. This camera can then be passed to IRenderer to be used for rendering.

Parameters
leftHanded
bool

Defines whether we have a left or right handed coordinate system

ppCamera
ICamera**

Returns the newly created camera object
